Package presentation

Class CommandControl

java.lang.Object
presentation.CommandControl
public class CommandControl
extends java.lang.Object
Processes the input text file and extracts the commands to be executed.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) static int fileLine
    int number used to keep track of the text file line currently being processed.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    CommandControl()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void commandProcessing​(java.lang.String command)
    Based on what the first part of the command is, calls the Business Logic Layer to execute a certain action.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> commandSplit​(java.lang.String command)
    Parses a command using RegEx into several parts.
    void fileProcessing​(java.lang.String fileName)
    Parses the input text file into a list which contains all the commands, and processes those commands separately.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      static int fileLine
      int number used to keep track of the text file line currently being processed.

    • CommandControl

  • Method Details

    • commandSplit

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> commandSplit​(java.lang.String command)
      Parses a command using RegEx into several parts.
      Parameters:
      command - a full line(command to be executed) of the text file
      Returns:
      a string array with the different parts of the command

    • commandProcessing

      public void commandProcessing​(java.lang.String command)
      Based on what the first part of the command is, calls the Business Logic Layer to execute a certain action.
      Parameters:
      command - a full line(command to be executed) of the text file

    • fileProcessing

      public void fileProcessing​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Parses the input text file into a list which contains all the commands, and processes those commands separately. For clarity purposes, a Thread.sleep(300) is called to observe the output. If the text file is of bigger size, delete it.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the input text file name
